overview: Tiffy was a junior achiever, the homecoming queen, her senior class president and the head of her sorority. Now she's going to jail. What's a beauty queen with a taste for pink and being in charge to do behind bars? Organize the girls, thats what! See as Tiffy licks her cellmates into shape, and deal with the guards and their prodding nightsticks. But will Warden Blower stand in the way of Tiffy's antics? Who will come out on top? It's a question of rehabilitation for the New Fish.
title: Hard Time
